item.title: Holiday Horror in Utah: The Tiede Family Tragedy
item.description: A factual look at the 1990 Tiede family cabin murders in Utah, how two intruders attacked a holiday trip and the long legal aftermath. It focuses on the known timeline and court outcomes.
